item.title: 印度纺织业将获得与孟加拉国同等的美国优惠待遇，官员称
item.description: 印度商业和工业部长皮尤什·戈亚尔周四表示，印度对美国的纺织品出口将获得与华盛顿给予孟加拉国同等的优惠待遇。【原文：India’s textile exports to the US will receive the same benefits Washington has extended to Bangladesh, Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal said on Thursday.】

item.title: 马克卢夫称欧洲央行下一步行动可能是降息或加息
item.description: 欧洲央行管理委员会成员加布里埃尔·马赫卢夫表示，政策制定者的下一步行动可能是提高或降低借贷成本。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Gabriel Makhlouf said policymakers’ next move could be to raise or lower borrowing costs.】

item.title: 高昂房价影响美国人的消费、工作与投资方式
item.description:
随着房价不断攀升至难以企及的高度，心灰意冷的美国人可能正转向加密货币及其他高风险投资。【原文：

As housing prices climb out of reach, discouraged Americans may be reaching for crypto and other risky investments.

】

item.title: 合法大麻产业蓬勃发展，银行服务却难以企及
item.description:
对于大麻企业而言，现金仍是王道，信用卡被禁止使用，而贷款则成本高昂。【原文：

For cannabis companies, cash is still king, credit cards are off-limits and loans are prohibitive.

】

item.title: 中国经济学家呼吁放宽资本管制，美元汇率波动
item.description: 多位中国知名经济学家呼吁放宽资金跨境流动限制，认为美元走弱为提升人民币可兑换性、增强其全球吸引力提供了历史性机遇。【原文：Several prominent Chinese economists have called for loosening restrictions on the movement of money in and out of the country, arguing that a weaker dollar provides a historic opportunity to boost the yuan’s global appeal by increasing its convertibility.】

item.title: 乌克兰无人机本周第二次袭击俄罗斯卢克石油公司炼油厂
item.description: 乌克兰无人机袭击了俄罗斯卢克石油公司旗下另一家炼油厂，基辅方面对俄方能源基础设施的攻击在上月短暂停火后再度展开。【原文：Ukrainian drones hit another Russian refinery owned by Lukoil PJSC, as Kyiv’s attacks on its foe’s energy infrastructure resume after a lull last month.】

item.title: 在德里，人工智能热潮伴随着33,000美元的酒店房费
item.description: 下周即将举行的印度人工智能影响力峰会引发了一场疯狂的抢夺战，争夺的对象却比计算能力或顶尖研究人员更为朴素：酒店客房。首都最豪华的套房现已涨至每晚3万美元以上。【原文：Next week’s India AI Impact Summit has kicked up a frenetic chase for something more prosaic than computing capacity or genius researchers: hotel rooms. The capital’s most exclusive suites are now commanding prices of more than $30,000 per night.】

item.title: 俄罗斯最新空袭加剧乌克兰能源行业压力
item.description: 在乌克兰总统泽连斯基表示莫斯科将拒绝美国斡旋的能源基础设施停火协议后，乌克兰遭遇了俄罗斯的又一次大规模空袭。【原文：Ukraine faced another large-scale Russian air strike following President Volodymyr Zelenskiy’s comments that Moscow will turn down a US-brokered ceasefire on attacks against energy infrastructure.】

item.title: 波兰Wibor利率在欧盟法院诉讼中幸免于难，而抵押贷款正面临审查
item.description: 欧盟最高法院作出裁决称，波兰房主可对与该国银行间利率挂钩的抵押贷款公平性提出质疑。由于Wibor基准利率本身未被认定为不公平，该裁决对银行的负面影响有限。【原文：Polish homeowners can challenge the fairness of mortgages tied to the nation’s interbank rate, the European Union’s top court said in a ruling that limits the negative impact on banks because the Wibor benchmark wasn’t itself deemed unfair.】

item.title: 新任美国商品期货交易委员会主席迈克尔·塞利格谈预测市场的监管之道
item.description:
一个崭新的世界，在这里我们几乎可以对任何事物下注。

【原文：

A new world, where we can bet on almost anything.

】

item.title: 捷克央行行长称降息取决于核心通胀率
item.description: 捷克央行行长表示，若核心通胀压力有所缓解，央行可能存在降息的"一定空间"，但借贷成本仍将维持在新冠疫情前的较高水平。【原文：The Czech central bank may have “some room” to lower interest rates if it sees easing pressures in core inflation but it will still keep borrowing costs higher than before the coronavirus pandemic, the bank’s governor said.】

item.description: 零散交易：美国商品期货交易委员会如何监管预测市场（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: How the CFTC Regulates Prediction Markets (Podcast)】

item.title: 亚信押注保险业，深化非洲风险承保业务
item.description: 泛非综合企业集团AXIAN集团业务涵盖电信、能源、房地产、金融科技及金融服务领域，现正拓展保险承保业务，以开拓全球保险覆盖率最低的地区。【原文：AXIAN Group, a pan-African conglomerate spanning telecommunications, energy, real estate, fintech and financial services, is expanding into insurance underwriting to tap the world’s least covered regions.】

item.title: 越南总理阮春福拟访美，寻求与特朗普就贸易问题会晤
item.description: 据知情人士透露，越南最高领导人杜纶正寻求下周访问华盛顿时与美国总统特朗普举行贸易会谈。此前数月谈判未能在棘手的"转运货物"问题上取得突破。【原文：Vietnam’s top leader To Lam is seeking to hold trade talks with US President Donald Trump next week during a visit to Washington, according to people familiar with the matter, after months of negotiations failed to produce a breakthrough on the thorny question of “transshipped” goods.】

item.title: 刚果共和国重返欧洲债券市场，发行7亿美元债券
item.description: 刚果共和国在三个月内第二次发行欧元债券，筹集资金7亿美元，较低的借贷成本吸引了该国重返市场。【原文：The Republic of Congo raised $700 million selling eurobonds for the second time in three months, drawn to the market by lower borrowing costs.】

item.title: 华虹预测落空，芯片制造商在中国人工智能竞赛中落后
item.description: 华虹半导体有限公司第一季度营收预测低于预期，表明随着竞争加剧，这家中国芯片制造商仍落后于国内同行。【原文：Hua Hong Semiconductor Ltd.’s first-quarter revenue forecast fell short of estimates, suggesting the Chinese chipmaker continues to lag behind domestic peers as competition heats up.】

item.title: Magnum冰淇淋股价下跌，因销售预期令人失望
item.description: 美格冰淇淋公司股价在阿姆斯特丹一度暴跌16%，此前这家前联合利华子公司公布的全年业绩和销售指引令投资者失望。【原文：Magnum Ice Cream Co. shares fell as much as 16% in Amsterdam after the former Unilever Plc unit posted full-year results and sales guidance that disappointed investors.】

item.title: 中国对欧盟乳制品征收最高12%关税，低于初步税率
item.description: 中国在反补贴调查后，对欧盟部分乳制品最终确定了最高12%的进口关税，远低于去年12月公布的初步税率。【原文：China finalized import tariffs on some dairy products from the European Union at as much as 12% following an anti-subsidy investigation, much lower than preliminary rates outlined in December.】

item.title: 土耳其上调通胀预期，通胀目标更难实现
item.description: 土耳其央行上调了年底通胀预期，此举可能加剧市场对降息步伐将明显放缓的预期。【原文：Turkey’s central bank raised inflation forecasts for the end of the year, a move likely to amplify expectations for a more pronounced slowdown in interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 俄罗斯在收紧信贷风险与避免经济下滑之间走钢丝
item.description: 俄罗斯央行行长埃尔维拉·纳比乌林娜为遏制通胀采取的强硬措施，使该行陷入两难境地：既要避免当前经济陷入衰退，又要防止银行业压力在未来演变为危机。【原文：Governor Elvira Nabiullina’s aggressive fight against inflation has left the Bank of Russia walking a tightrope between avoiding recession today and preventing stress in the banking sector from snowballing into a crisis tomorrow.】

item.title: 新加坡总理黄循财为"更危险的世界"制定预算
item.description: 新加坡总理黄循财公布了新财年预算案，他表示该预算将助力这个城市国家在全球化退潮、世界局势"更危险"的背景下蓬勃发展。【原文：Singapore’s Prime Minister Lawrence Wong unveiled a budget he said will help the city-state thrive as globalization retreats and it faces a “more dangerous” world.】

item.title: 马来西亚修订官员持股规定，报告称
item.description: 马来西亚公务员体系正在重新审视公职人员持股规定，据《马来西亚今日》报道，此前有关反贪污专员持股情况的报道引发全国哗然。【原文：Malaysia’s civil service is reviewing rules on stock ownership for public officials, Malaysiakini reported, days after a report on the anti-graft chief’s shareholdings caused an outcry in the country.】

item.title: LexisNexis母公司RELX销售增长未达分析师预期
item.description: 英国信息与分析公司RELX Plc（旗下拥有LexisNexis和爱思唯尔品牌）公布的年度营收增长未达分析师预期，投资者正密切关注其人工智能新产品对业务的影响。【原文：RELX Plc, the British information and analytics company that owns the LexisNexis and Elsevier brands, reported annual revenue growth that missed analysts’ estimates as investors watch for signs of how new artificial intelligence products will impact its business.】

item.title: 匈牙利通胀率骤降，为货币宽松铺路
item.description: 匈牙利1月份的通胀率骤降至近八年来最低水平，这强化了市场预期，认为该国央行可能开始下调欧盟最高的基准利率。【原文：Hungary’s headline inflation rate plunged to the lowest level in almost eight years in January, strengthening expectations that the central bank can start cutting the European Union’s highest key interest rate.】

item.title: 联合利华因美国和印度市场对美容品牌的需求而提升销售额
item.description: 联合利华公司作为全球最大的消费品集团之一，去年年底公布的销售额超出预期，这得益于在美国和印度等主要市场高端美容及家居护理产品的强劲表现。【原文：Unilever Plc, one of the world’s biggest consumer goods groups, posted better-than-expected sales at the end of last year, boosted by premium beauty and home care products in key markets including the US and India.】

item.title: 英国经济增速低于预期，斯塔默遭遇新挫折
item.description: 英国第四季度经济增速低于预期，给正竭力挽救首相职位的基尔·斯塔默施加了更大压力。【原文：The UK economy grew less than forecast in the fourth quarter, piling pressure on Keir Starmer as he battles to save his premiership.】

item.title: 新加坡增资基金以吸引更多企业上市
item.description: 新加坡总理黄循财于2025年11月19日星期三在新加坡彭博新经济晚宴接受采访时表示，近期中美峰会创造了"亟需的"暂时稳定局面，这将为两大经济体之间的互动提供防护栏。【原文：Lawrence Wong, Singapore's prime minister, during an interview at the Bloomberg New Economy Gala Dinner in Singapore, on Wednesday, Nov. 19, 2025. The recent US-China summit created a “much needed” temporary stabilization that will provide guardrails for the two economic superpowers to engage, Wong said.】

item.title: 软银因押注OpenAI估值提升而扭亏为盈
item.description: 软银集团在孙正义押注OpenAI后，因人工智能支出前景乐观带来的估值收益而扭亏为盈，重返季度盈利。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. sprang back to a quarterly profit after Masayoshi Son’s bet on OpenAI paid off in valuation gains on optimism around artificial intelligence spending.】

item.title: 英国第四季度经济增速低于预期
赛诺菲突然更换领导层，保罗·赫德森被撤换
item.description: 赛诺菲首席执行官保罗·哈德森将被默克集团的贝伦·加里霍接替，此前这家法国制药公司决定不再续聘其任期。【原文：Sanofi’s Chief Executive Officer Paul Hudson will be replaced by Merck KGaA’s Belén Garijo, after the French drugmaker decided not to renew his term.】
